title: Discussion of the paper �Language after Liftoff: Fed Communication Away from the Zero Lower Bound�
content: Large-Scale Asset Purchases  Program Date  Announced Description Time  QE1 Nov. 25, 2008 & Mar. 18, 2009  Agency debt:  up to $200 billion Agency MBS:  up to $1,250 billion  Longer-term Treasuries:  $300 billion  Over several quarters By year-end  Over next 6 months  QE2 Nov. 3, 2010 Longer-term Treasuries:  $600 billion By end-June 2011  MEP Sept. 21, 2011 &  June 20, 2012  Longer-term Treasuries:  $400 billion (Sell equal amount of short-term  Treasuries)  By end-June 2012  Continue MEP at current  pace through end-2012  4
